report.title: Volunteers Who Are Deleted And Still Allocated
report.description: List volunteers who have deleted their account, but are still allocated a square.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM people p JOIN person_attribute_values sqrPav ON sqrPav.person_id=p.id AND sqrPav.person_attribute_id=#person_square_attr_id# AND sqrPav.deleted=false JOIN locations sqr ON sqr.id=sqrPav.int_value AND sqr.created_on::date >= date '#ignore_square_dates_before#' AND sqr.location_type_id = #core_square_type_id# AND sqr.deleted=false JOIN locations_websites lw on lw.location_id = sqr.id AND lw.website_id in (#website_ids#) WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT u.id FROM users u JOIN users_websites uw on uw.user_id = u.id AND uw.site_role_id IS NOT NULL AND uw.website_id in (#website_ids#) WHERE u.person_id = p.id )

param.name: person_square_attr_id
param.display: Id of the person attribute that holds user squares

param.name: ignore_square_dates_before
param.description: Ignore any squares created before this date. Useful if old squares are left on the system but are not currently active.
